::Lambda::
    She shrunk into Burning Hammer's embrace at the sounds of the explosions. 
 She stood tall only moments before Trinity entered the room.  After hearing 
her brief explanation Lambda was in shock.  "Take us to her Trinity.  And 
quickly."
